justification: Proposal centers on A’s needs, not B’s. It overlooks B’s preferences (consistency, veterans, pocket passers) and B’s TE weakness. B already has a Tier 1 QB, reducing the appeal of a dual-threat QB; Anderson fits but may not justify losing RB depth. The 2-for-1 for a Tier 5 “workhorse” only loosely supports A’s stated stability goal. Rationale is brief and generic.
